title: Ghana Consumer
description: A digital advocacy platform empowering Ghanaians to voice concerns, track issues, and access consumer rights resources. Built with scalability and transparency in mind.

title: Kristoni E-commerce
description: An e-commerce platform designed for seamless online shopping with responsive UI, product catalog, secure transactions, and intuitive customer experience.

title: Sedan Landbank
description: A real estate platform showcasing land sales with an interactive map, gallery, and contact features. Designed to enhance trust and visibility for property buyers.

title: PEC Consult Ltd
description: A corporate website for a civil engineering consulting firm, featuring service showcases, newsletter integration, and an AI-powered chatbot for client engagement.

title: Kokorokoo Agriculture E-commerce
description: An agriculture-focused e-commerce platform connecting farmers with buyers, featuring blockchain-based transaction tracking and secure payment integration.
